title: No Server Import In Page
content:
# No Server Import In Page

> Prevent usage of `next/server` outside of `middleware.js`.

title: No Server Import In Page
content:
## [Why This Error Occurred](#why-this-error-occurred)

`next/server` was imported outside of `middleware.{js,ts}`.

title: No Server Import In Page
preview: Only import and use `next/server` in a file located within the project root directory: `middleware.{js,ts}`. middleware.ts [Code Block]
